Name: Verify user can be redirected to the next page with a valid email address
Precondition:
- User has a valid email address
- Login page is open
Objective: User should be redirected to the next page with a valid email is provided
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The email address is entered successfully into the email field

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click to the get started button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The user redirected to the next page successfully

Name: Verify user cannot login when the email field is empty
Objective: Ensure the system block login when email field is empty
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Leave the email field is empty
Click to the get started button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The system keeps the user on the same page and focuses on the email input 
field

Name: Verify an error message is shown when user enters an invalid email format
Objective:
Ensure the system displays a validation error when an invalid email format 
is entered
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The email address is entered into the email input field

The system keeps the user on the same page and displays an invalid email 
format message

Name: Verify leading and trailing spaces in the email address are trimmed and processed correctly
Precondition:
- User has an valid account
- Login page is open
Objective:
Ensure the system trims leading and trailing spaces in the email address 
correctly
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter a valid email address with leading and trailing spaces
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The system automatically trims the leading and trailing spaces from the 
email address
The user can be displays the next page successfully

Name: Verify the email input field enforces the maximum allowed character limit
Objective: Ensure the system prevents email input that exceeds 50 characters
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter an email address more than maximum character limit
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The system does not allow any additional characters after the maximum limit 
is reached

Name: Verify a validation error is shown when special characters or scripts are entered
Objective:
Ensure the system displays a validation error and prevents the user from 
proceeding when special characters or scripts are entered in the email 
field
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter a special characters or script into the email field
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The system displays an validation error message and prevents the user from 
proceeding to the next page

Name: Verify pressing the enter key triggers the same action as clicking the get started button
Precondition:
- User has a valid email address
- Login page is opened
Objective: Ensure the enter key performs the same action as the get started button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The email address is entered into the email input field

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Use enter key for trigger the get started button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: User can be displayed the next page successfully

Name: Verify the system focuses the email field when the user enters only whitespace characters
Objective:
Ensure the system focuses email field when the user enters only white space 
characters
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter only whitespace characters into the email field
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The system accepts entered email field without validation at this stage

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click to the get started button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The system focuses email field and keeps the user login page

Name: Verify page content updates correctly when a different language is selected from the language dropdown
Objective:
Ensure that all page content is updated according to the selected language 
from the language dropdown
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click to the language dropdown button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The system diplays the languages selection dropdown
The system updates all page content to the selected language

Name: Verify user is redirected to the sign In page when clicking the Sign In button
Objective:
Ensure that the system dipslays sign in page when user clicks sign in 
button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The user redirected to the sign in page successfully
